cause.description:
Our mission is to free women prisoners who were convicted of murder but who acted in self-defense against abusers and did no receive due process or fair trials; and to conduct public education and advocacy for justice and human rights for all women in prison. Our appeals for clemency and parole are based on failures of the criminal-legal system to duly consider the consequences to women of battering relationships and the reasonableness of their actions in the context of repeated violence; and the inaccessibility of the Constitution's promise of justice and equal rights for women.
Website: http://www.umich.edu/~clemency
1. We recommend the immediate release of all incarcerated women who acted in self defense against and abuser or under force by an abuser.
cause.mission: To free women prisoners who were convicted of murder but who acted in self-defense against abusers.
cause.name: Michigan Women's Justice & Clemency Project
